text: my name is Jeff bina I'm the writer and

trauma and has absolutely cognitive
dissonance when he's trying to reconcile
what's going on by finding his
girlfriend's alive at the same time
realizing she died her parents who are
so happy that she's back don't want to
question anything and they're basically
putting out possible deniability to

in the future by just questioning where

to go away again and Aubrey's character

that anything happened she didn't
realize that she died she's just sort of
watching her boyfriend and her parents
get into a massive fight she didn't do
one of the things that we did in this

always at Zach's level so it's always

approach this I always thought of this
is more of a relationship story and the

dynamic that they're experiencing
because I guess in this situation it's
